general

Class UndirectedGraph<E,A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • general.UndirectedGraph<E,A>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the element type of a vertex
    A - the attribute type of an edge
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Graph<E,A>

    public class UndirectedGraph<E,A>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Graph<E,A>
    Graph abstract data type class for undirected graphs
    Author:
    Chigozie Ekwonu
